  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120557</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120557</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Energija in potencial</string>
            <string language="en">Energy and Voltage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie und Spannung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie et tension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia e tensão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia e tensione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια και τάση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía y voltaje</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Sprememba kinetične in potencialne energije nabitega delca med dvema nasprotno nabitima ploščama.</string>
            <string language="en">Transformation of kinetic energy into potential energy of a charged particle when placed between charged plates.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni potencial</string>
            <string language="en">electric potential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">energija</string>
            <string language="en">energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Transformation der kinetischen Energie in 
mögliche Energie eines belasteten Partikels, wenn Sie zwischen 
belastete Platten plaziert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transformation d'énergie cinétique dans 
l'énergie potentielle d'une particule chargée une fois placé entre 
les plats chargés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transformação da energia cinética na energia 
potencial de uma partícula carregada quando colocado entre placas 
carregadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasformazione di energia cinetica in energia 
potenziale di una particella caricata una volta disposto fra le 
piastre caricate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετασχηματισμός της κινητικής ενέργειας στην πιθανή 
ενέργεια ενός χρεωμένου μορίου όταν τοποθετείται μεταξύ των 
χρεωμένων πιάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transformación de la energía cinética en 
energía potencial de una partícula cargada cuando está colocado 
entre las placas cargadas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisches Potential</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">potentiel électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">potencial elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">potenziale elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική δυνατότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">potencial eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
